description:
The new Disney Plus Star Wars series The Acolyte stars Amandla Stenberg as not just one – but two new characters. Stenberg plays both Osha and Mae in the series which has received mixed reviews from audiences. As fans have become accustomed to, however, some of these audience members have outright attacked the show’s cast [...]

description:
